name: Fuzzy's World of Miniature Space Golf
name_original: Fuzzy's World of Miniature Space Golf
description:
Fuzzy's World of Miniature Space Golf is a game developed by Pixel Painters. It came out on 01-01-1995. It was published by Pixel Painters. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Fuzzy's World of Miniature Space Golf on PC.
